1100010101010000 1011011111011001 1 -> sum: 0111110100101010, cout: 1
0010110000110110 0101111111011101 0 -> sum: 1000110000010011, cout: 0
1011011010001001 0010000101011100 0 -> sum: 1101011111100101, cout: 0
0111111000001000 1010010001011101 1 -> sum: 0010001001100110, cout: 1
0010001011100110 1011011011011110 1 -> sum: 1101100111000101, cout: 0
0000110011011010 1111000001010000 1 -> sum: 1111110100101011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
